title.en: Thank You Dinner to Retiring National Officials 2000
title.cy: Cinio Diolch i Swyddogion Cenedlaethol yn ymddeol 2000

description.en: 2 photographs from different angles showing national officials during the dinner.On the left, Mair Edwards; Marian Lake; Mary Roberts; Eryl Jones; Elinor Davies; Tegwen Grffiths and Sylwen Davies. On the right, Blodwen Jones;?;Eirlys Phillips; Marged Jones and Catrin Stevens.
description.cy: 2 lun yn dangos y swyddogion o onglau gwahanol yn y ginio. O'r chwith, Mair Edwards; Marian Lake; Mary Roberts; Eryl Jones; Elinor Davies; Tegwen Griffiths a Sylwen Davies. O'r dde, Blodwen Jones; ?; Eirlys Phillips; Marged Jones a Catrin Stevens.
